title: Concept
description: A unit of thought in an SKOS managed vocabulary [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secconcept].

skos:broader.description: Concepts that are broader in scope than this concept [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#sechierarchy]. The 'skos:broader' property implies an inverse 'skos:narrower' relation.

skos:broaderTransitive.description: Concepts that are broader in scope than this concept, with explicit transitive behavior [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#sechierarchy]. The 'skos:broaderTransitive' relation implies an inverse 'skos:narrowerTransitive' relation.

skos:related.description: Concepts that are related to this concept [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secassociative].

skos:inScheme.description: Concept schemes this concept belongs to [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secscheme].

skos:topConceptOf.description: Schemes this is a top concept of [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secscheme].

skos:exactMatch.description: Concepts in other schemes that are exact synonyms for this concept [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secmapping].

skos:closeMatch.description: Concepts in other schemes that are close, but not exact, synonyms for this concept [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secmapping].

skos:broadMatch.description: Concepts in other schemes that are broader than this concept [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secmapping].

skos:relatedMatch.description: Concepts in other schemes that are related to this concept [https://www.w3.org/TR/skos-primer/#secmapping].

@id.description: A unique identifier for the concept.
